name: Uncommon Time
description:
Eighteen-year-old cellist Alto Cantabile is heir to an ancient legacy. In order to fulfill her duty, she brings her skeptical best friend, violinist Teagan Almace, along with her to the far northern country of Harmonia. Alto must gather three other players to form a quintet, and find the sheet music she needs for a very special performance.

18歳のチェリスト少女、アルト・カンタービレは代々一族に伝わる使命を果たすために親友のヴァイオリニスト少女、ティーガン・オールメイスを連れて遠い北国・ハーモニアへと旅立つ。アルトはクインテットに必要となるもう三人の奏者と、とある重要な演奏のための楽譜を探さなければならない。

Uncommon Time is a lengthy game (estimated play time 15-25 hours!) with multiple endings. It is recommended for ages 15 and up, and features disturbing/violent imagery, minor jump scares, and mild sexual content. There's a detailed list of content warnings that you can find on the official webpage, but since some of the warnings are spoilers, please only check it if you know there's content you need to avoid to stay safe. This game has also got a lot of flashy and screen-shaking animations, so if you have an illness or disability that does not do well with those, you may not want to play it.

Information about the cast of characters and the freeware and shareware materials used to bring this game to life can be found on the official webpage.

Uncommon Timeはマルチエンディング型の長編RPGです。一部性的・暴力的な表現とびっくり要素を含まれた作品ですので、対象年齢は15歳以上推奨となっています。

素材提供と登場人物の紹介については、公式紹介ページへお越しください。
